p: The attained results of the GC-MS analysis of the n-hexane fraction of G. A. showed the presence of lipids, alkanes, alcohols, terpenoids, etc. ( Figure 2, Table 3), A total of 73 compounds were positively detected and among them n-hexadecanoic acid (13.5%) was the most abundant one, followed by oleic acid (12.98%) and linoleic acid (11.58%). The % of similarity ranged from 89 to 98%.
